descriptionHtml:
[size=4][Description]
I added a new female follower Rita in Dragonsearch,and she can use Destruction spells. 
She Immunes both paralysis and strong unrelenting force.
In order to customize your favourite armors, I made her nude and you can make her wear anything you like.
Thank you for your playing! 

[color=#ff0000]Please do NOT redistribute this Mod,Thank you![/color]

[b][color=#ff0000]ENDORSE Please! Thank You![/color][/b]

[Character][/size]
Name :Rita
Body : UNPBO
Weight : 0
Voice Type : FemaleYoungEager
Height : 0.97
Combat Style : Custom(Magic and Shout)
Inventory : Naked
Skills : Destruction Magic And Shout
Level : 10-Infinite
Location : Dragonsreach
Marriage：Yes
[size=4]
[How to install]
1: Download the file
2: Install the file in the NMM and MO
3: Enable the ESP
[/size]
